thread.title: Fox’s Chris Wallace: ‘Tonight, Donald Trump Became the President’
thread.title_full: Fox’s Chris Wallace: ‘Tonight, Donald Trump Became the President’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Fox’s Chris Wallace: ‘Tonight, Donald Trump Became the President’
text:
Fox’s Chris Wallace: ‘Tonight, Donald Trump Became the President’ by Josh Feldman | 10:41   
Fox News’ Chris Wallace tonight said that President Trump ‘s address to the joint session of Congress was “by far the best speech I’ve ever heard Donald Trump give.” 
He said Trump said a lot of things that Republicans have been waiting years for a president to say from that significant position, including the phrase “radical Islamic terrorism.” 
In fact, it was so serious that Wallace felt this basically sent the message that “tonight, Donald Trump became the President of the United States.” 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
